get_direction_modifier() - Method in class Jose.src.characters.Player
Movement to the right means increasing the X axis, movement to the left means decreasing the X axis and similarly for the Y axis changes, this method calculated the sign of the position difference variable for the update_movement method.

Returns the sign modifier for movement in a certain direction.

J

Jose.src - package Jose.src
Main package containing the JoseMain class that is used to run the game.
Jose.src.characters - package Jose.src.characters
Package containing the abstract class Character and all classes that inherit from it, representing all player or non-player characters.
Jose.src.objects - package Jose.src.objects
Package containing all non-character objects in the game, be it movable or imovable.
Jose.src.util - package Jose.src.util
Package containing the utilities used in this game.
JoseMain - Class in Jose.src
Main game class, updates and renders the game, selects levels.
JoseMain() - Constructor for class Jose.src.JoseMain
Constructor, sets all necessary attributes.
JoseMain.STATE - Enum in Jose.src
Enum that denotes the game's state.
jump() - Method in class Jose.src.characters.Player
Makes the player jump by changing his state and vertical speed.
jump_diff - Variable in class Jose.src.characters.Player
Added every jump frame to the jump distance until it passes the maximum jump height.
jump_distance - Variable in class Jose.src.characters.Player
Current distance passed of the jump, used to determine if the player should start falling.

L

land() - Method in class Jose.src.characters.Player
Makes the player land by changing his state, also used to stop movement.

List of lethal tiles (water, lava) in the current level's map.

Keeps track of the number of frames since the last level change, used for debug purposes - this prohibits one button click to change the level multiple times.
levels_total - Variable in class Jose.src.JoseMain
Total number of levels accessible, increment this number after creating a level.
looks_at(float) - Method in class Jose.src.characters.Player
Checks if the player is looking at a point in the map (horizontal check only).

T

Boolean value determining if this object should be destroyed.
turn() - Method in class Jose.src.characters.Robot
Turns the robot if needed amount of steps has been walked by changing it's direction and applying the sprite offset, since the sprites differ when flipped by a vertical axis.
